summary: I can\'t speak for many, but I fell victim to Eola\'s seductive charm near instantaneously. It was love at first sight. Needless to say, I was severely disappointed when I found out that I couldn\'t do much with her past the quest.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod, so I am very uncertain if this will work for anyone else. Please go easy on me if it doesn\'t, and leave a comment; I\'ll try to fix it. ;_;

Things this mod is supposed to do:
-Subtly change facegen data to be more attractive.
-Add a Marriage faction.
-Make Eola essential.

Things this mod is not supposed to do:
-Fail at one or all of the above things.
-Crash your game.

Installation:
1. Really?
2. Just extract to your \\Data\\ folder if it wasn\'t obvious enough.
If you somehow don\'t like/want the new facegen data, feel free to only use the esp.

Changelog:

v0.3 - setrelationshiprank no longer required. Disposition now takes care of this. Thank you GoodfellowGoodspring!

v0.2 - Completion of \"The Taste Of Flesh\" will now make Eola enable the marriage dialogue option. If you\'ve already completed this quest, open console and do a \"setrelationshiprank player 4\" on her.
author: Recon415
